articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Message to Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Message to Syrian President
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Thursday sent a reply message to Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic.
					 The message expressed profound thanks to the Syrian president for sending a message of greeting on the occasion of the 104th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the DPRK, reflecting boundless reverence for him.
					
					 Reaffirming the will of the DPRK to further strengthen the friendly and cooperative relations with Syria true to the intention of Kim Il Sung, the message wished the president and Arab people of Syria greater success in their struggle for foiling the aggression and terrorism of hostile forces and defending the sovereignty and territorial integrity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday met and had a talk with the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) led by Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, in a compatriotic atmosphere at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: Congratulations to Lao President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Lao President
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Bounnang Vorachith upon his election as president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic at the 1st Session of the 8th National Assembly of Laos.
					 Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries provided by the preceding leaders would grow stronger, the message sincerely wished the Lao president good health and great success in his responsible work for building the prospering country.

articles.title: Congratulations to Lao PM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Lao PM
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Thong Loun Sisoulith upon his election as prime minister of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
					 The message sincerely wished the Lao prime minister big success in his responsible work for the country's socio-economic development, expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: South Hamgyong, North Hwanghae Provincial, Rason City Conferences of WPK Take Place
articles.content:
South Hamgyong, North Hwanghae Provincial, Rason City Conferences of WPK Take Place
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- The South Hamgyong and North Hwanghae Provincial and Rason City Conferences of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place on the spot.
					 The conferences were attended by delegates elected by the party organizations at all levels in the provinces.
					
					 All the participants paid silent tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The conferences elected their executives.
					
					 They reviewed the work done by the provincial party committees.
					
					 Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Pak Thae Dok, chief secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK, and Rim Kyong Man, chief secretary of the Rason City Committee of the WPK, made reports.
					
					 Speeches were made at the conferences.
					
					 They discussed and decided the tasks for further strengthening the party organizations and enhancing their functions and roles as required by the developing reality when the revolutionary cause of Juche enters its leaping stage.
					
					 The conferences reviewed the work of the provincial party auditing commissions and elected the leadership bodies of the provincial party committees.
					
					 There took place the election of delegates and nomination of observers to the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 Speeches on electing supreme leader Kim Jong Un as delegate to the Seventh Congress of the WPK were made there.
					
					 They courteously proposed to elect Kim Jong Un as delegate to the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 Speakers expressed their determinations to dynamically advance along the road of the Juche revolution while absolutely believing and following only Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Decisions on electing Kim Jong Un as delegate to the Seventh Congress of the WPK were adopted at the conferences with a unanimous approval.
					
					 The delegates and observers to the Seventh Congress of the WPK were elected and nominated at the conferences.

articles.title: National Chauvinist Campaign of Right-wing Reactionary Forces of Japan against Koreans Slammed
articles.content:
National Chauvinist Campaign of Right-wing Reactionary Forces of Japan against Koreans Slammed
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry in a statement on Thursday lashed out at the right-wing reactionary forces of Japan for conducting a national chauvinist campaign against Koreans in Japan after a large quake occurred in Kumamoto area, Kyushu, Japan recently.
					 A nonsensical article which claims that Koreans poisoned wells was posted on websites and rumors inciting such extreme national antipathy and repugnancy that Kumamoto should beware of possible uprising by Koreans are afloat, the statement noted, and continued:.
					
					 This is an unpardonable mockery and undisguised hostile act against the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and the DPRK as it proves that the departed soul of Japanese militarism which imposed colonial slavery upon the Korean nation and brought all sorts of misfortunes to it in the past is still haunting.
					
					 The reckless campaign of the Japanese right-wing reactionaries against Chongryon and Koreans in Japan is a direct product of the Abe regime's madcap hostile policy toward the DPRK as it was prompted by the ceaseless inveterate moves of the Japanese government against the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should stop at once the base and despicable campaign against the DPRK and Chongryon and discontinue acts of conniving and fostering the encroachment upon the dignity and human rights of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 If Japan pays no heed to our warning, it will be wholly responsible for all ensuing grave consequences.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Moves to Set Fire to Forests of DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Moves to Set Fire to Forests of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection of the DPRK issued a statement on Thursday denouncing the south Korean puppet group for unhesitatingly letting fly balloons for causing fire to the forest area of the DPRK as a desperate campaign against it.
					 Balloons containing inflammable materials, timers and electric detonating devices were recently discovered in Mt. Kumgang area including Namae-ri and Onjong-ri, Kosong County, Kangwon Province and in Hanwol-ri, Anak County, South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 According to the investigation made by a competent institution of the DPRK, it has been confirmed that these balloons designed to cause fire at any place at the preset time were sent by the puppet group into the areas of the DPRK.
					
					 The statement said this proves that the Park Geun Hye group of traitors keen on escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen is working hard to impose huge material damage and environmental disaster upon the DPRK by causing fire, not content with scattering anti-DPRK leaflets.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The above-said moves are very hideous provocation and crime of the puppet group to disturb the forest restoration campaign now under way as the nationwide, all-people campaign and the building of a thriving nation in the DPRK.
					
					 All the successive south Korean puppet rulers have behaved mischievously, hell-bent on confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and but there have been no such depraved guys as the Park Geun Hye group who are working so hard to cause even a fire in the land of the nation in peacetime.
					
					 Such criminal act is touching off bitter indignation and hatred among the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 If the Park group persists in the above-said provocations, it will face strong corresponding counteraction of the DPRK.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK Red Cross Society Urges S. Korea to Send Back Citizens of DPRK
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK Red Cross Society Urges S. Korea to Send Back Citizens of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK issued a statement Thursday denouncing the Park Geun Hye group for challenging the just demand of the DPRK to immediately send back the citizens of the DPRK who were allured and abducted in group.
					 We already strongly urged the Park Geun Hye group to apologize for the thrice-cursed crimes committed by it by alluring and abducting in group the citizens of the DPRK and immediately send them back, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 But the south Korean authorities are not sending them back to the folds of their families while citing such sophism as "far-fetched assertion" and "stop to threatening".
					
					 Park Geun Hye, in particular, uttered "group defection from the north" and "effect of sanctions" at her first appearance from Chongwadae after her party's heavy defeat in the recent puppet National Assembly election.
					
					 This is an unpardonable provocation against the DPRK and a mockery of the public opinion at home and abroad as it is a last-ditch effort of those much upset by the disclosure of their unprecedented unethical crimes before the world.
					
					 The recent case is premeditated and organized group abduction which Park committed by mobilizing gangsters of the puppet Intelligence Service.
					
					 It is exactly for this reason that those of the Intelligence Service are applying news blackout to prevent the voices of the DPRK citizens whom they allured to south Korea from being heard by media.
					
					 We have detailed data concerning the recent abduction and are fully ready to disclose them before the world.
					
					 The families who have their beloved daughters abducted in broad daylight are earnestly asking for direct contact with them as early as possible.
					
					 We will send the parents to Panmunjom or to Seoul, if necessary, so that they could meet face to face with their daughters.
					
					 What we want is to let the daughters meet their parents and directly clarify their stand.
					
					 If the puppet group declines our just demand, it will just mean self-admitting the group abduction.
					
					 If the puppet group does neither respond to the demand for the direct contact with parents nor send back the citizens of the DPRK while keeping them in custody, we, as we have already warned, will launch strong retaliatory action with various methods against the group of traitors including Chongwadae, the chief culprit of the abduction.

articles.title: Spokesman for C.C., Youth League Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Abduction of Young Women
articles.content:
Spokesman for C.C., Youth League Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Abduction of Young Women
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League issued a statement on Thursday hitting out at the Park Geun Hye group for committing the hideous act of alluring and abducting a group of young women of the DPRK.
					 The statement bitterly condemned the Park group for its treacherous and unethical crime in the name of all young Koreans.
					
					 The above-said crime is a product of the deliberate and premeditated scenario for confrontation with the DPRK worked out by Park Geun Hye and the puppet Intelligence Service, it said, adding:
					
					 The Park group of traitors orchestrated such shocking "north wind" conspiratorial case on the threshold of the puppet National Assembly election and posted photos and videos of women who had been allured and abducted on the eve of the election and conducted agitation in a bid to garner votes. This goes to clearly prove the sinister political purpose sought by the Park group.
					
					 The hearts of all young people in the DPRK are burning with the strong will to take revenge upon the Park group, political tricksters and maniacs hell-bent on confrontation with compatriots as they allured and abducted those young women in broad daylight.
					
					 The Park group should clearly understand the spirit and will of the infuriated young people of the DPRK to annihilate the enemy, make an apology for the thrice-cursed allurement and abduction of the young women and immediately send back them to their beloved family members and the warm care of the DPRK.
					
					 If the Park group persistently forces "defection" upon them despite the DPRK's warning, pushing the situation to a serious phase, its young people will mete out a merciless punishment to the enemies in the name of Songun Korea.

articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Calls for Throwing Overboard Park Geun Hye Group
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Calls for Throwing Overboard Park Geun Hye Group
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released a statement Thursday in connection with the fact that Park Geun Hye is making desperate efforts to get rid of the abyss of total bankruptcy.
					 At her first appearance at a meeting of chief secretaries on April 18 after the puppet National Assembly election, Park Geun Hye went so impudent as to ask the "National Assembly" "to be hard-working" and to call for "uninterrupted promotion of reform", far from uttering words of repentance after facing a stern judgment made by the public, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Far from apologizing to the nation for her criminal act of pushing the north-south ties into the worst catastrophe and pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the eve of a nuclear war, Park blustered that it is the time  for "the ruling and opposition to take united action" to cope with the "north's sudden provocation".
					
					 By mobilizing her yes-men in the "Saenuri Party" which looks like a mourner's house, Park is trying to seize the position of the No. 1 party by bringing together independent elects whom she had purged. She is, at the same time, instigating the puppet prosecution to stage the farce of investigating violations of the election law in a wicked bid to expel those elected from the opposition parties and to make the democratic pro-reform forces timid.
					
					 Such desperate move of Park is an open negation of the election results, an open challenge to the stern judgment made by the south Korean people and an intolerable mockery of the desire and wish of all the Koreans for peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 All facts clearly prove that nothing will change in the plight of the south Koreans and the north-south relations will be pushed into a more uncontrollable phase and the whole nation would not be able to escape the disaster of a nuclear war if the Park group is allowed to go reckless.
					
					 The south Koreans of all social standings irrespective of isms and partisan interests and strategies are required to mercilessly foil the self-righteous, high-handed and arbitrary practices of the Park group which is committing thrice-cursed crimes, defying the people's mindset.
					
					 They should also courageously turn out in the nationwide struggle in unity to throw overboard the Park group, the biggest trouble-makers, as it is pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the dangerous point of explosion while rendering the confrontation between the fellow countrymen extremely tense.
					
					 The Park group should clearly understand that its continued unpopular rule and confrontation with the fellow countrymen in defiance of the people's mindset and the trend of the times will bring it to a final ruin amid bitterer curses and denunciation by all the Koreans including those in south Korea.

articles.title: South Sudan President Hopes for Steady Good Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
South Sudan President Hopes for Steady Good Relations with DPRK 
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Ambassador Kim Chol Ho presented his credentials to Salva Kiir Mayardit, president of the Republic of South Sudan, on April 13.
					 At the meeting the president hoped that the friendly and good relations between South Sudan and the DPRK would continue in the future, too.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from First Secretary of C.C., Ukrainian Communist Party
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from First Secretary of C.C., Ukrainian Communist Party
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Petro Nikolayevich Symonenko, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Ukrainian Communist Party, on April 15.
					 The message said:
					
					 We extend our sincerest warm congratulations to you on the occasion of the great holiday, the birth anniversary of the great leader of the Korean people Comrade Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung, the great Generalissimo of the DPRK, is the symbol of the heroic Korean people's greatness.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea could achieve distinguished successes in the cause of building the developed socialist state modeled on the great Juche idea under the wise leadership of Comrade Kim Il Sung.
					
					 We sincerely wish you fresh success in the socialist construction for the prosperity and well-being of the country and signal victory in the struggle against world imperialism.

articles.title: Construction of Nampho Baby Home, Orphanage Completed
articles.content:
Construction of Nampho Baby Home, Orphanage Completed
 Nampho, April 21 (KCNA) -- The Nampho Baby Home and Orphanage were newly built in Nampho City, port city of culture on the west coast of Korea.
					 They are children's happy cradle which the Workers' Party of Korea provided true to the noble intentions of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu who called children king of the country and loved them most.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un said that high laugh of the children makes the whole country bright, giving all loving cares which he can give as their own father and bestowed great benevolence of having the palace built for the children in the city, too.
					
					 Officials, builders and helpers in the city completed the project on the highest level, true to the intention of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The baby home and orphanage are equipped with all amenities and environment for nursing and bringing up children on the highest level.
					
					 A ceremony of completion of the construction took place on Thursday.

articles.title: National Railway Transport Sci-tech Presentation Held
articles.content:
National Railway Transport Sci-tech Presentation Held
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- The national scientific and technological presentation in the field of railway transport took place at the Branch Academy of Railway Science of the State Academy of Sciences from April 19 to 21.
					 It was sponsored by the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					
					 Present there were teachers, researchers, technicians and field officials of Kim Il Sung University, the Branch Academy of Railway Science of the State Academy of Sciences, the Research Institute of Maritime Transport under the Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport, Pyongyang University of Railways, Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, etc.
					
					 It was divided into construction, machine, electricity- automation-information and economy-operation panels.
					
					 Its participants heard more than 180 valuable papers dealing with scientific research achievements and experience gained in the fields of railway transport and the land and maritime transport.
					
					 During the presentation there took place lectures on the trend of developing transport, scientific and technical problems in modernization. The participants looked round the successes and exhibits displayed by the Branch Academy of Railway Science.

articles.title: Indonesian Diplomats Visit Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace
articles.content:
Indonesian Diplomats Visit Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Indonesian Ambassador to the DPRK Bambang Hiendrasto and his embassy staff members visited the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace Thursday on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's and leader Kim Jong Il's visit to Indonesia.
					 Being briefed on the fact that the palace turned into a comprehensive extra-curricular base for schoolchildren and a pedigree establishment for educating talents, they went round various places of the palace.
					
					 The guests enjoyed a performance given by members of the art groups of the palace.

articles.title: Wangjaesan Art Troupe Gives Performance in Kaesong
articles.content:
Wangjaesan Art Troupe Gives Performance in Kaesong
 Kaesong, April 21 (KCNA) -- The Wangjaesan Art Troup has given its performances in Kaesong City since Wednesday to encourage the participants in the 70-day campaign.
					 They were watched by people from all walks of life and officials in the city.
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as light music, popular songs and dances.
					
					 In female chorus "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un", female duet "His Humanity" and other numbers the performers truthfully represented the Korean people's loyal determination to achieve spectacular successes and perform great labor feats in the on-going general offensive for May of victory.
					
					 Also put on the stage were dance pieces including national dance "Let's Be Proud of Our National Costumes" and tap dances "Cheerful Soldier Cook" and "Young Days".
					
					 Dance "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order" instilled into the people the spirit to annihilate the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors and surely achieve the historic cause of national reunification if Marshal Kim Jong Un gives an order.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Tours Pyongyang
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Tours Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) led by Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), visited the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site.
					 The group laid bouquets before the mosaic depicting the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu before paying tribute to them.
					
					 They went round the historical relics associated with the exploits Kim Il Sung performed by choosing the site for the first arsenal in the liberated country and exploring the untrodden path for the self-reliant national defense industry.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the group said:
					
					 We looked back with deep emotion on the painstaking efforts made by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for founding and developing the Juche-oriented national defence industry and their undying exploits. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung was an illustrious commander and peerless patriot who laid a firm foundation for building a powerful national defence industry.
					
					 We will certainly usher in a new heyday of Chongryon by remaining loyal to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is making a new history of victory of Songun Korea with the might of the Paektusan army.
					
					 The congratulatory group also toured the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, the Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage, the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District, etc.

articles.title: Art Troupes of Overseas Koreans Leave
articles.content:
Art Troupes of Overseas Koreans Leave 
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Art troupes of Koreans in Japan and the U.S. left here on Thursday after taking part in the 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.

articles.title: Many Technical Innovations Made
articles.content:
Many Technical Innovations Made
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- At least 400 technical innovations were made or introduced at industrial establishments in Pyongyang after the start of the 70-day campaign.
					 In the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill alone, more than 60 technical innovations have been applied to different processes. One of them is the establishment of production process of reclaimed rubber based on far-infrared radiation material.
					
					 The Songyo Knitwear Factory manufactured a small barotor machine by its own efforts, while the East Pyongyang Thermal Power Plant raised efficiency of dust collection by upgrading equipment to improve its work environment.
					
					 Technical innovations were also witnessed at the Kyongryon Aeguk Soda Pop Mill, Pyongyang Leather Shoes Factory and other units.

articles.title: Socialist Labor Law of DPRK
articles.content:
Socialist Labor Law of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- People in the DPRK are leading an independent and creative life as genuine masters of the society.
					 Their right to work is fully guaranteed by the Socialist Labor Law which was enacted and promulgated at the second session of the sixth Supreme People's Assembly held in April Juche 67 (1978) in the presence of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The law stipulates the fundamental principles of labor in socialist society, citizens' duty to labor, socialist distribution according to the work done, technological revolution and improvement of their technical skills, labor protection, labor and relaxation and state and social benefits for the working people.
					
					 Thanks to this law, any able-bodied has the right to being provided with stable jobs by the state in accordance with their wish and ability.
					
					 And regular and study-while-working educational systems are playing an important role in training all the people for persons of high ability.
					
					 The popular labor protection policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government urges all working sites to be fully equipped with safety facilities and industrial hygienic conditions.
					
					 Working people in the DPRK are also enjoying benefits from 8-hour working system, paid-leave system, system of accommodation at health resorts and holiday homes at the expense of the state, etc.
					
					 The DPRK is already well-known over the world for its free compulsory education system and free medical care system as well as social insurance and pension systems.

articles.title: Moran Hill in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Moran Hill in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Moran Hill is one of scenic spots in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, for its peculiar looks like peony in blossom.
					 The hill boasts of a number of historic remains and natural monuments together with over 210 species of plants and scores of kinds of animals.
					
					 Among them are inner walls and northern walls of the Walled City of Pyongyang, Ulmil and Choesung pavilions, Chilsong Gate and Sophora japonica growing on Chongryu Cliff.
					
					 Choesung and Ulmil pavilions are believed to be built in the mid-sixth century, the age of Koguryo Kingdom (B.C. 277-A.D. 668).
					
					 Commanding spring scenery from Ulmil pavilion has been regarded as one of eight famous views of Pyongyang from long ago.
					
					 There are also many legends and stories associated with the hill which are still remembered by people.
					
					 Under the loving care of the peerlessly great persons, Moran Hill has been spruced up to be a scenic spot for the people.

articles.title: S. Korean Inhabitant Slams Authorities for Sidestepping Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Tragedy
articles.content:
S. Korean Inhabitant Slams Authorities for Sidestepping Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Tragedy 
 Pyongyang, 21 (KCNA) -- A south Korean inhabitant staged a protest action calling for probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster at the Jeju Provincial Building on April 18, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 He volunteered to rescue more than 20 children at the time of the ferry sinking. He staged protest actions several times against the Park Geun Hye group which was sidestepping the probe into the truth about the disaster without saying any word of apology, while pretending to rescue drowning children and misleading the public opinion.
					
					 On the day, too, he condemned the authorities for their unethical action and strongly urged them to probe the truth behind the disaster at an early date.

articles.title: Jongyojo Members Demand Stop to Suppression
articles.content:
Jongyojo Members Demand Stop to Suppression
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Members of the Teachers Union (Jongyojo) of south Korea held a press conference outside the "government" building in Sejong City on April 18 to demand stop to the suppression of the organization, according to the south Korean MBC.
					 Stressing the need to guarantee Jongyojo basic rights as a trade union, they accused the authorities of working hard to deprive Jongyojo of its rights by taking follow-up measures.
					
					 They urged the authorities to stop at once unreasonable disciplinary measure against leading members of Jongyojo and suppression of it.
					
					 They declared that the outcome of the "National Assembly" election was the people's severe punishment of the "government's" moves for "introducing state-compiled history textbooks."

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Italian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Italian Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- The full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "For the Implementation of the Judicial Policy of Our Party" was posted by the Milano Center for the Study of the Juche Idea of Italy on its website on April 15, the birth anniversary of the President.
					The work, published on April 29, Juche 47 (1958), indicates tasks and ways for implementing the judicial policy of the Workers' Party of Korea to defend the interests and rights of the popular masses.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was brought out in pamphlet by the Belugrafica Publishing House of Venezuela on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and clarifies the tasks for successfully accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Russian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Russian Website
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was posted on the Irkutskblogspot. ru, the website in Irkutsk of Russia, on April 12.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for firmly defending the idea and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and adding shine to them forever.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Meetings for remembering President Kim Il Sung took place in Mongolia, Mexico and the Czech Republic on April 7 on the occasion of his birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun).
					 S. Sodbatar, chairman of the Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia, recollected the loving care and benevolence shown by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for his family.
					
					 He renewed his resolution to cultivate more immortal flowers, flowers of the sun shining with the august names of the great leaders and disseminate them so that their exploits may be conveyed through generations.
					
					 N. Sarantuya, member of the Leadership Council of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, said that Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of revolutionary struggle in his teens, defeated the Japanese imperialists and accomplished the historic cause of liberating the country. The President founded the Workers' Party of Korea after the country's liberation, he added.
					
					 Andres Gasca Sanchez, president of the Mexican Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung and Leader Kim Jong Il, praised Kim Il Sung for founding the immortal Juche idea and performing undying feats for the cause of building the party, state and army.
					
					 Zdenek Klimek, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party-21 of the Czech Republic, said that Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea and built and glorified Korean-style socialism guided by it, adding that these are the undying exploits performed by him for humankind.
					
					 The general secretary praised him as the greatest man recognized by the whole world.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Peru
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Peru
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Lima on April 13.
					 Tani Baler Lopera, international secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un with the meeting as an occasion.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Pakistan, Bulgaria, Nigeria
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Pakistan, Bulgaria, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Pakistan, Bulgaria and Nigeria on April 11 and 12 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Displayed at the venues were photos documenting the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and their works, and photos and publications introducing the struggle of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the pictures depicting the great leaders standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Zabed Ansari, secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, said in a report that the President founded the Juche idea, Songun idea and built a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence and made undying contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					 Mincho Minchev, chairman of the Bulgarian Communists' Party and chairman of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, noted the President is still alive in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressives for his immortal exploits.
					
					 Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, noted that the cause of independence, Songun and socialism pioneered by the President is being steadfastly carried forward by Kim Jong Un. He is bringing about ceaseless eye-opening events, decisively meeting the challenges of the hostile forces, the chairman added. 
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Guinea
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Guinea
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given at the Guinean Giko Company and a commando of the Guinean Ministry of Defence between April 8 and 11 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Diallo, field chief of the company, delivered a lecture titled "Kim Il Sung, his tender-hearted image".
					
					 He said:
					
					 Broad smile of tender-hearted President Kim Il Sung, founding father of socialist Korea, is kept in the hearts of the progressive people as the sun.
					
					 Sunny smile of the President that makes everyone feel at ease and happy represents his humanity.
					
					 The President founded the Juche idea, the idea which centers on man, and took warm care of the people.
					
					 Bangoura, field chief for security of the company, said in a lecture titled "Kim Il Sung, his brilliant august name" that the President rendered positive support to the people of many countries in their struggle for national liberation against imperialism and building of a new society and made tremendous contribution to the development of the non-aligned movement.
					
					 The chief for security of the company gave a lecture titled "Benefactor of African people" at which he said the President indicated the way for the people of African countries including Guinea and positively supported their struggle.
					
					 Battalion Commander Camara and Vice-Commander Conde of a commando of the Guinean Ministry of Defence said the President, eternal leader of the Korean people, made devotion to the people all his life and there is no such a great man as the President who dedicated his all to the country and people, after hearing a lecture titled "Whole life dedicated to the people".

articles.title: Bangladeshi Political Figure Supports Cause of Korean People
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Political Figure Supports Cause of Korean People
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- We are sure that the servicepersons and people of the DPRK will certainly win a final victory in the historic cause of building a thriving nation and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, said this in a statement on April 12. 
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 We will celebrate with splendor the 104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung together with the world progressives.
					
					 On this occasion, we recollect with deep emotion the President's brilliant revolutionary career and undying exploits.
					
					 He is the eternal sun of Juche as he founded the immortal Juche idea and Songun idea, the most scientific guiding idea which indicates the way for the Korean people and progressive mankind, and founded the Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK and the Korean People's Army.
					
					 His idea and cause were successfully carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il and are shedding more brilliant rays under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Diverse events were held in various countries between March 30 and April 13 to celebrate the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included photo exhibitions and film shows in Guinea and Angola, a photo exhibition in South Africa and an online photo exhibition in Germany.
					
					 Displayed at the exhibitions and posted on the website were photos showing the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Song of Sun Will Resound Forever" and "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un".
					
					 The international secretary of the Youth Organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola said:
					
					 We send warm congratulations to all the Korean people and youth on the occasion of the birth anniversary of the President, the founder of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 The WPK is the most powerful and revolutionary party which has dynamically advanced with the Juche idea fathered by the President as its unique guiding idea for 70 odd years since its foundation.
					
					 We have drawn strong confidence and courage from the proud servicepersons, people and youth of the DPRK who significantly celebrated the 70th anniversary of the founding of the WPK under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 21 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, envio el dia 19 un mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz, Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba.
					La misiva va como lo siguiente:
					
					Le hago llegar mis calurosas felicitaciones y cordial saludo camaraderil en relacion con que se efectuo con exito el VII Congreso del Partido Comunista de Cuba y fue reelegido Vd. como Primer Secretario del CC de PCC.
					
					La reeleccion de Vd. expresa gran confianza y esperanza en Vd. de todos los militantes de vuestro partido y los habitantes.
					
					Convencido de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos partidos y pueblos de los dos paises, establecidas en medio de la lucha comun por la independencia antiimperialista y el socialismo se amplien y se desarrollen mas en lo adelante, aprovecho esta oportunidad para formular votos por los mayores exitos en el trabajo responsable de Vd. por el fortalecimiento del partido y el avance victorioso de la Revolucion Cubana.

articles.title: Efectuada conferencia de Ciudad de Pyongyang del PTC
articles.content:
Efectuada conferencia de Ciudad de Pyongyang del PTC
Pyongyang, 21 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 19 y 20 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la conferencia de la Ciudad de Pyongyang del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					En el acto tomaron parte los delegados elegidos en las organizaciones partidistas a todos niveles y los organos centrales en esta capital.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					En la ocasion fue electa la presidencia.
					
					La conferencia hizo balance del trabajo del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					El informante subrayo que en el curso del establecimiento del sistema de ideologia unica y la direccion unica del Partido tomandolo como principio fundamental en la construccion del Partido, se consolido mas firmemente la unidad en torno al Lider y se establecio la ferrea disciplina para aceptar sin falta las politicas del Partido y materializarlas hasta el fin.
					
					Y menciono las tareas para intensificar mas el trabajo del partido y acelerar la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo conforme a la exigencia del la realidad en desarrollo que se encuentra en la epoca de salto para el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					En la reunion hubo discursos y se adopto la resolucion.
					
					En ella se realizo el balance del trabajo de la Comision Revisora del PTC en esta capital.
					
					 Tambien, se eligio el organo directivo del Comite del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					Y se efectuo la eleccion de los delegados y recomendacion de los observadores al VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Kim Su Gil, secretario jefe del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, pronuncio las palabras para elegir al Mariscal como delegado al VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					El orador senalo que la eleccion del Mariscal deviene la manifestacion de la absoluta confianza y noble fidelidad de todos los militantes del partido y habitantes de esta capital.
					
					Y propuso cortesmente elegir al Mariscal como delegado al VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Otros oradores senalaron que se hace mas firme la conviccion de que sera definitiva la victoria final de la revolucion del Juche al enaltecer al Mariscal Kim Jong Un y expusieron la decision para luchar tenazmente siguiendo la direccion del Partido.
					
					En la conferencia fue aprobada por unanimidad la resolucion sobre la eleccion del Mariscal como delegado al VII Congreso del PTC.
					
					Y fueron electos los delegados y recomendados los observadores al VII Congreso del PTC.

articles.title: ACR de RPDC demanda al Sur de Corea devolver a los secuestrados
articles.content:
ACR de RPDC demanda al Sur de Corea devolver a los secuestrados
Pyongyang, 21 de abril (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que la banda surcoreana de Park Geun-hye desafia a la justa demanda de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de devolver sin demora a los ciudadanos de la RPDC secuestrados en colectivo, el portavoz del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 21 una declaracion.
					Ya hemos exigido fuertemente a la banda de Park Geun-hye a pedir perdon por su tremendo crimen de secuestro colectivo y devolver de inmediato a los ciudadanos de la RPDC, senala la nota y continua:
					
					Sin embargo, las autoridades surcoreanas no aceptan nuestra demanda soltando los disparates como la "persistencia injusta" y el "cese de amenaza". 
					
					En particular, la traidora Park Geun-hye, que no salia de Chongwadae despues de ser derrotada en las recientes elecciones parlamentarias, habla de la "fuga colectiva" y la "eficiencia de sancion".
					
					Lo calificamos de locura agonizante de los aturdidos ante la revelacion de sus crimenes de lesa humanidad y lo denunciamos como otra provocacion intolerable a la RPDC y burla a la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					El presente caso es el crimen premeditado y organizado por los gangsteres del Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea bajo la instigacion de Park Geun-hye.
					
					Por esta razon, el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia no da a la publicidad la voz de los secuestrados y aplica la censura de prensa al respecto. 
					
					Tenemos los datos concretos sobre el presente crimen de los titeres surcoreanos y estamos dispuestos a anunciarlo a todo el mundo. 
					
					Los familiares de las secuestradas demandan con ansiedad permitirles el encuentro pronto con sus hijas. 
					
					De acuerdo con sus exigencias, les enviaremos a Phanmunjom o, en el caso necesario, a Seul para que ellas se reunan personalmente con sus hijas y que las norcoreanas secuestradas expongan su voluntad a sus queridas madres.
					
					Si los titeres surcoreanos niegan esta justa demanda, esto significara reconocer por si mismos su crimen de secuestro colectivo.
					
					En el caso de que ellos sigan reteniendo a los ciudadanos de la RPDC sin aceptar la demanda de la RPDC, tomaremos, como ya hemos advertido, la revancha de diferentes formas contra Chongwadae, promotor del presente incidente, y a los titeres surcoreanos.

articles.title: UJS expone decision de castigar a la banda de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
UJS expone decision de castigar a la banda de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 21 de abril (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung hizo publica el dia 21 una declaracion condenando a la banda surcoreana de Park Geun-hye que secuestro en colectivo y llevo al Sur de Corea a las adolescentes de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					El documento denuncia categoricamente este crimen antinacional y antietico en nombre de todos los jovenes coreanos y continua:
					
					Este malvado acto es el producto del complot anti-RPDC de Park Geun-hye y el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea. 
					
					La banda traidora de Park Geun-hye invento este incidente intrigante en visperas de las elecciones parlamentarias y divulgo las fotos y videos de las jovenes secuestradas como una campana para obtener mucho mas votos a favor. 
					
					Este hecho demuestra claramente el designio politico de los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					Ahora, todos los jovenes de la RPDC estan llenos de la decision de vengarse de la banda de Park Geun-hye, horda de fraudulentos politicos y maniacos de enfrentamiento fratricida que secuestraron a plena luz del dia a las mujeres de la RPDC. 
					
					La camarilla de Park debe pedir perdon por su tremendo crimen y devolver a las mujeres norcoreanas secuestradas al regazo generoso de la patria, dandose clara cuenta del temperamento y voluntad de los jovenes coreanos indignados. 
					
					Si la banda de Park Geun-hye agrava mas la situacion obligandoles la sumision a las adolescentes secuestradas sin prestar oidos a nuestra advertencia, los jovenes coreanos daran el castigo despiadado a los enemigos en nombre de la Corea del Songun.

articles.title: Hay que eliminar a banda de Park Geun-hye, insiste CRPP
articles.content:
Hay que eliminar a banda de Park Geun-hye, insiste CRPP
Pyongyang, 21 de abril (ACNC) -- En relacion con que Park Geun-hye se desespera por salir de un aprieto del fracaso general, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 21 una declaracion como sigue:
					  El dia 18, Park Geun-hye participo en la reunion de secretarios superiores de Chongwadae por primera vez despues de terminadas las elecciones parlamentarias, ocasion en la cual dijo descaradamente que ella desea la "Asamblea Nacional  que trabaja" y la "promocion incesante de la reforma" sin reflexionarse nada de la severa sentencia de la opinion publica.
					
					  Y agrego que ahora es necesaria la "union del partido en el poder y los opositores frente a la provocacion inesperada del Norte" lejos de pedir disculpas ante toda la nacion por haber llevado las relaciones Norte-Sur a la pesima catastrofe y la Peninsula Coreana al borde del estallido de la guerra nuclear.
					
					  Por otra parte, se enfrasca por arrebatar a fuerza la posicion del primer partido al agrupar a traves de sus subordinados a los electos independientes expulsados del "Partido Saenuri" por ella misma.
					
					  E incito a la fiscalia titere a librar la investigacion de la violacion de ley de elecciones para expulsar a los elegidos  de los partidos opositores y encoger a las fuerzas de reforma democratica.
					
					  Tales maquinaciones de Park devienen la negacion abierta al resultado de las presentes elecciones, el desafio abierto a la sentencia severa de la opinion publica del Sur de Corea y la burla intolerable al deseo de todos los coreanos que aspiran a la paz y la reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Todos hechos demuestran que mientras exista la banda de Park Geun-hye, no se cambiara nunca la situacion de los habitantes surcoreanos, las relaciones Norte-Sur seran mas  catastroficas y todos los coreanos no evitaran la calamidad de la guerra nuclear.
					
					  Los habitantes de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea deben frustrar implacablemente el egocentrismo, la arbitrariedad y la tirania de la camarilla de Park que comete los mas atroces crimenes desafiando a la opinion publica.
					
					  Igualmente deben desarrollar audazmente la lucha pannacional por eliminar con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion a la horda de Park Geun-hye que lleva al limite de explosion peligrosa la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana agravando al maximo la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					  La banda de Park Geun-hye debe conocer exactamente que cuanto mas recurra a la politica anti-popular y la confrontacion fratricida desafiando a la opinion publica y nadando contra la corriente, mas recibira la censura y condenacion de los habitantes surcoreanos y todos los connacionales y no evitara la ruina final.
